artifacts.name: Enchanted Crystal Ball
artifacts.description: A mystical crystal ball with the power of scrying and divination.

artifacts.name: Phoenix Feather Wand
artifacts.description: A wand crafted from a genuine phoenix feather, perfect for casting powerful spells.

artifacts.name: Cursed Mirror of Reflection
artifacts.description: A mirror with a dark history, said to reflect the true nature of those who gaze into it.

artifacts.name: Vampire Fang Amulet
artifacts.description: An amulet containing a genuine vampire fang, believed to offer protection against supernatural forces.

artifacts.name: Haunted Ouija Board
artifacts.description: A classic Ouija board with a spooky twist, rumored to communicate with spirits.

artifacts.name: Witch's Broomstick
artifacts.description: A traditional broomstick imbued with magical properties, perfect for flying.

artifacts.name: Eldritch Rune Stones
artifacts.description: A set of ancient rune stones, believed to harness mystical energies for various purposes.

artifacts.name: Glowing Fairy Dust Vial
artifacts.description: A vial filled with sparkling fairy dust, said to bring luck and positive energy.

artifacts.name: Ghostly Lantern
artifacts.description: A lantern that emits an ethereal glow, believed to attract and communicate with spirits.

artifacts.name: Moonstone Talisman
artifacts.description: A talisman crafted from a rare moonstone, known for enhancing intuition and psychic abilities.

artifacts.name: Banshee's Wail Earrings
artifacts.description: Earrings said to capture the haunting wail of a banshee, invoking protection and foresight.

artifacts.name: Dragon's Scale Necklace
artifacts.description: A necklace adorned with a genuine dragon scale, believed to grant strength and courage.

artifacts.name: Mermaid's Tears Potion
artifacts.description: A magical potion made from the tears of a mermaid, rumored to bring emotional healing.

artifacts.name: Werewolf Claw Amulet
artifacts.description: An amulet containing a sharp werewolf claw, believed to offer protection during the full moon.

artifacts.name: Mystic Crystal Wand
artifacts.description: A wand crafted from a rare mystic crystal, channeling energy for spellcasting and rituals.

artifacts.name: Eternal Phoenix Feather Quill
artifacts.description: A magical quill crafted from the eternal feathers of a phoenix, perfect for writing enchanted scrolls.

artifacts.name: Spectral Crystal Dagger
artifacts.description: A dagger with a blade made from a rare spectral crystal, known for its ability to cut through magical barriers.

artifacts.name: Oracle's Tea Leaves
artifacts.description: A mystical blend of tea leaves, said to enhance divination and reveal hidden truths.

artifacts.name: Gargoyle Guardian Statue
artifacts.description: A miniature gargoyle statue believed to ward off negative energy and protect the home.

artifacts.name: Eclipse Crystal Pendulum
artifacts.description: A crystal pendulum attuned to lunar and solar energies, ideal for dowsing and divination.

artifacts.name: Necromancer's Grimoire
artifacts.description: A ancient grimoire containing dark rituals and spells, not for the faint-hearted.

artifacts.name: Chalice of Eternal Youth
artifacts.description: A mystical chalice said to grant eternal youth to those who drink from it.

artifacts.name: Feywild Flower Crown
artifacts.description: A flower crown crafted from rare Feywild flowers, believed to connect wearers to the fae realm.

artifacts.name: Thunderstorm Crystal Globe
artifacts.description: A crystal globe that mimics thunderstorms, providing a calming and electrifying ambiance.

artifacts.name: Spirit Whisperer Earrings
artifacts.description: Earrings designed to amplify one's ability to communicate with spirits and otherworldly entities.

artifacts.name: Serpentine Dreamcatcher
artifacts.description: A dreamcatcher woven with serpentine threads, believed to ward off nightmares and negative energy.

artifacts.name: Mystic Moon Mirror
artifacts.description: A mirror reflecting the phases of the moon, said to enhance intuition and reveal hidden insights.

artifacts.name: Witch's Cauldron Incense Burner
artifacts.description: An intricately designed cauldron-shaped incense burner, perfect for ritualistic use.

artifacts.name: Celestial Star Map Tapestry
artifacts.description: A tapestry featuring a celestial star map, believed to bring cosmic energies into the home.

artifacts.name: Lunar Lullaby Music Box
artifacts.description: A music box that plays a soothing lunar lullaby, believed to bring peaceful sleep.
